.. _bob.db.avspoof_btas2016:

==========================================
 AVspoof Database Anti-spoofing Protocols
==========================================

This database interface supports the evaluation (test) protocol used in BTAS Speaker Anti-spoofing competition 2016. The supported protocol's name is `btas2016` and the supported set is `test`.


Getting the data
--------------------------

The data for the BTAS 2016 competition can be downloaded directly from AVspoof_ database link. It is free of charge but signing the EULA is required.
